mapper.update: update student_th_video_study set student_member_id = #{studentMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, course_id = #{courseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, guid = #{guid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, play_begin_time = #{playBeginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, play_end_time = #{playEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, play_length = #{playLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, client_type = #{clientType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, watch_ip = #{watchIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, student_member_id, course_id, guid, play_begin_time, play_end_time, play_length, client_type, watch_ip, area from student_th_video_study where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
